relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y on Earth communities stewardship and sustainability podcast series.

relationships.relationship: is a grandmother and mother of

helping people get off of their diabetes pills.
Fallen Jacobs... has worked closely with the community of the aquasasinate on economic development.
As a fierce defender of sovereignty and human rights, Fallen spent 12 years in successful court battle.

relationships.relationship: spent 12 years in court battle against
relationships.evidence_text: Fallen spent 12 years in successful court battle against the Canadian border service agency.
The agency was found guilty of six discrimination counts by the Canadian human rights tribunal.
Fallen now works with indigenous youth and families to rekindle, restore and enhance their sense of cultural identity.
Galwenios did jock spends most of her time as a homemaker caring for her five children.

relationships.target: traditional support, cultural teachings and preservation
relationships.evidence_text: She has helped develop traditional support, cultural teachings and preservation within the tribe.

evidence.target_surface: traditional support, cultural teachings and preservation

relationships.evidence_text: She has currently enrolled at the Native Education and Training College in a one-year program.
Galweniosda... wishes to continue working with women, men and youth who suffer from domestic violence.
Galweniosda is also a self-taught seamstress.
has a small business making traditional dresses as well as designing her own clothing line.
